name: Coron@mail
description:
Created by: Illustro

Illustro Members: Alexis Hou, Elaine Mo, Ylan Nguyen, Sophia Stutes, Melissa Zhang

In Coron@mail, you are playing the role of a worker in an email center during the COVID-19 pandemic, receiving and answering questions of the concerned citizens.

If you do a good job advising people to stay safe, you could make a positive impact in the world.
